name: ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Fetch Some Data
description: Use Python to fetch data from a REST API
code:
import requests


def get_posts():
    url = "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts"

    response = requests.get(url)
    response.raise_for_status()
    return [[post["userId"], post["title"]] for post in response.json()]
